metadata.description: The friendly name for the workbook that is used in the Gallery or Saved List.  This name must be unique within a resource group.
The gallery that the workbook will been shown under. Supported values include workbook, tsg, etc. Usually, this is 'workbook'
The id of resource instance to which the workbook will be associated
The unique guid for this workbook instance

### Change Log
Use this report to analyze the the sizes of the different tables and Latency in your workspace and agents.  This report checks the overall workspace health.

|Version|Description|
|---|---|
|v1.1|Added Events Per Second (EPS) to Workspace Info Tab.| 
|v1.2|Added EPS with a breakdown for Device Vendor in CommonSecurityLog
|v1.3|Added EPS Tab and Min, Max values
|v1.4 | Added Checks Tab for Daily, Weekly and Monthly suggested checking routines.  Also ASC info in Costs Tab.
|v1.4.2 | Added Groups to all Tabs. Added Price info and Help button.
|v1.4.3 | Added to [COST] tab and report of "GBytes used per Computer" 
|v1.4.4 | Quick fix to get the TableName duplicate removed.  Added value to Y axis of [Cost] trend graph, Remove content (EPS) that is planned for the Azure Sentinel Health workbook.  
|v1.4.5 | Added extra Cost info, improve Weekly reports and other grids , testing release ONLY
|v1.4.6 | Moved Price to Costs Analysis Tab (all pricing is now in the same place). Added some table data, description and links to Latency grid.  Filter on Queries in Weekly report and Workspace audit filters |

To do Next: n/a

"},"customWidth":"50","conditionalVisibility":{"parameterName":"Help","comparison":"isEqualTo","value":"Change Log"},"name":"text - 0"},{"type":1,"content":{"json":"## Help File
## Usage
	- Please select your Subscription and Workspace
	- Time Range: is the time you wish to query back to. i.e 7days from now, into the past.
	- Help is available in various parts of this Workbook.
## Categories
	- Azure Monitor Logs (Workspace)
	- Azure Sentinel
	- Azure Security Center
## Solutions
|Solution|Description|
|---|---|
| Workspace Infomation | info about the workspace, usage and statistics|
|Latency | Which Tables or machines have latency issues, average, minimun and maximum values|
|Costs Analysis| Looking again at the tables in the [Workspace Info] tab, but also you can select a Price of your choosing (Â£,$)|
|Azure Sentinel | specifc data about Sentinel|
| Regular Checks | Daily, Weekly and Monthly suggested checks you can look at.|

## Data Sources
	- Azure Resource Graph (ARG) and Various tables within Azure Monitor Logs (Workspace)."},"customWidth":"50","conditionalVisibilities":[{"parameterName":"selectedTab","comparison":"isEqualTo","value":"WorkspaceInfo"},{"parameterName":"Help","comparison":"isEqualTo","value":"Yes"}],"name":"text - 0 - Copy"},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"resources

// Add enrichment information about selected Tables
//
let enrich = datatable (TableName:string,Information:string,link:string)
    [
    "Usage","This is common data in all Workspaces","https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/azure-monitor/platform/manage-cost-storage",
    "Operation","This is common data in all Workspaces","",
    "OfficeActivity","This is a PUSH data source, typically <30mins (max 1day)","https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/office/office-365-management-api/troubleshooting-the-office-365-management-activity-api#what-is-the-maximum-time-i-will-have-to-wait-before-a-notification-is-sent-about-a-given-office-365-event",
    "Perf","Operational Data source, this can have limited value to Azure Sentinel","https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/azure-monitor/platform/agent-data-sources",
    "Event","Windows Server Event Logs","https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/azure-monitor/platform/agent-data-sources",
    "Syslog", "Logs from Linux","https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/sentinel/connect-data-sources",
    "SecurityAlert","Security Alerts from various sources","https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/sentinel/connect-data-sources",
    "Alert","Alerts from Azure Monitor sources","",
    "SecurityEvent","Data from Azure Security Center or Azure Sentinel","https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/sentinel/connect-data-sources",
    "CommonSecurityLog","CEF data for Azure Sentinel, from multiple vendors","https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/sentinel/connect-data-sources",
    "SecurityIncident","Incident events from Azure Sentinel, also see SecurityAlert","",
    "Heartbeat", "MMA info from Log Analytics agents","",
    "LAQueryLogs","Auditing of the workspace has been set","https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/azure-monitor/log-query/query-audit",
    "VMConnection","Azure Monitor for VMs or Service Map","https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/azure-monitor/reference/tables/vmconnection",
    "KubeServices","AKS data sources","",
    "Update","Patching info","",    
    "ThreatIntelligenceIndicator","Azure Sentinel TI data","", 
    "AuditLogs","Azure AAD audit information","", 
    "SigninLogs","Azure AAD Signin information","", 
    "AzureActivity","Azure Activity Logs","",
    "HuntingBookmark","Azure Sentinel - Hunting book mark data","",  
    "W3CIISLog","IIS log data from Azure Monitor Logs",""
    ]
; 
// Gather and calculate Latency information
union withsource = TableName1 *
| summarize 
      ['average E2E IngestionLatency'] = round(avg(todouble(datetime_diff("Second",ingestion_time(),TimeGenerated))/60 ),2)
    , ['minimun E2E IngestionLatency'] = round(min(todouble(datetime_diff("Second",ingestion_time(),TimeGenerated))/60 ),2) 
    , ['maximum E2E IngestionLatency'] = round(max(todouble(datetime_diff("Second",ingestion_time(),TimeGenerated))/60 ),2)
  by TableName = TableName1
| sort by ['average E2E IngestionLatency'] desc
// join to enrichment and remove unwanted columns 
| join kind= fullouter (enrich) on TableName
| where isnotempty(TableName)
| project-away TableName1

Price Parameter: Please provide an estimated cost so that we can get a value in the "Estimated Table Price" column, in the [Workspace Info] tab.   
i.e If your Log Analytics PAYG is Â£2.00 per GB enter 2.00.  You can enter an interger (without a currency symbol), in format 1.0, 2.0, 3.1 etc...  
If you want to see the combined Log Analytics + Azure Sentinel estimated cost please use both PAYG prices i.e. 2.00 + 2.00 = 4.00.  Please see the licence pages for both products.

Base value on 7th July 2020, using an example of Azure Sentinel ($2.46 US Central PAYG) + Log Analytics ($2.76 US Central PAYG) 


Note: No capacity reservation is taken into account.","style":"info"},"customWidth":"48","conditionalVisibilities":[{"parameterName":"selectedTab","comparison":"isEqualTo","value":"Cost"},{"parameterName":"Help","comparison":"isEqualTo","value":"Yes"}],"name":"text - 15"},{"type":1,"content":{"json":"### Azure Center Center 

ASC allows for 500MB/day (0.5GBytes) of *free* data to be sent by each Computer. Please see the licencing link at the bottom of this text box.
You have two variables
1. The total allowed: < number of computers> * 0.5GB  (this is a pooled metric). 	
	e.g 4 computers * 0.5GB = 2.0GB, the maximum value which is allowed to be sent for free.  Any data over this number will have the standard (Azure Sentinel + Log Analytics) charge applied.     
2. The actual data sent by each computer
	e.g 4 * computers * 0.1GB = 0.4GB, which is allowed for free.

To fully calculate the Azure Sentinel average GBytes per day, if ASC data is present, we need to  take #1 from the total or #2.  This is shown as the "Revised GiB Number". 

### Note: Licencing is subject to change, you must fully investigate and understand from the current documentation the implications.
https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/pricing/details/security-center/  correct as of 17th September 2020. 
RESOURCE TYPE	FREE TIER	STANDARD TIER (a.k.a "Azure Defender ON")
Virtual Machine	Free	$0.02/Server/Hour
Included data - 500 MB/day","style":"info"},"customWidth":"50","conditionalVisibilities":[{"parameterName":"selectedTab","comparison":"isEqualTo","value":"Cost"},{"parameterName":"Help","comparison":"isEqualTo","value":"Yes"}],"name":"text - 15 - Copy"},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"union withsource = tt *
| where TimeGenerated > ago(30d)
| where _IsBillable == True
// Calculate the daily GiB size per billable Table and unique Server count 
| summarize allGBytes =sum(_BilledSize)/(1024*1024*1024), ascGBytes=sumif(_BilledSize, Type == "SecurityEvent")/(1024*1024*1024), ascComputerCount = dcountif(Computer,tt == "SecurityEvent") by bin(TimeGenerated, 1d)
// Calculate daily GiB average, and average ASC server count.  Each Server is allowed max 0.5GB each
| summarize avg(allGBytes), avg(ascGBytes),ascComputers=round(avg(ascComputerCount),0),ascMaxGB = avg(ascComputerCount) * 0.5
// If ASC sends less than the allowed max, revise the GB averge per day, else use the max allowed (all servers * 0.5)
| extend revisedNumber = iif(avg_ascGBytes <= ascMaxGB, allMinusASCused = (avg_allGBytes - avg_ascGBytes),allMinusASCused = (avg_allGBytes - ascMaxGB) )
| project ['Raw Average GiB']   = avg_allGBytes,
          ['ASC has used, GiB'] = strcat(round(avg_ascGBytes,1)," of " ,round(ascMaxGB,1), " across ", ascComputers , " Computers"), 
          ['Revised GiB Number']= round(revisedNumber,2),
          ['Help'] ="Please toggle [Show Help] to Yes,  for more information"

// Predict data volume for the next month
//
let startDate = {TimeRange:start}; // go back in time nn days

let projectTo = now()+90d; // project forward nn days
